saao/saa05/P334725
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}NIGIN-EN lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-ia₂ DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU-MEŠ TA na-x+x x x x x x x x x x a-na ma-gu-ri x x x x x {KUR}hu-buš-ka-a.a i-sa-ap-ra-šu₂ ma-a la {LU₂}da-a.a-URU x x x ma-a {URU}nu-ra-a.a ša TA x x ih-li-qu-u-ni šu₂-nu ki-i {LU₂}EN.NAM o ša {KUR}u₂-a-si a-na {KUR}mu-ṣa-ṣir e-ru-bu-ni {KUR}hu-buš-ka-a.a ina pa-ni-šu₂ it-ti-it-su ma-a BE-ma x x ta-šap-pa-ra x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x-šu₂ ta-na-pa-ha x x x x x x x x x+x {KUR}mu-ṣa-ṣir x x x x x x x x+x a-na nu-up-ša₂-te x x x x x x x x+x
